name: Duck Hunting Elite Challenge - 2015 Pro Showdown
name_original: Duck Hunting Elite Challenge - 2015 Pro Showdown
description: 2015 Duck hunting season is open in the year 2017 & 2018! Cool update on an older game. New visuals and more! The hunt is on now more than hunting games ever. This duck hunter game takes place in a beautiful forest perfect for a fun duck hunt game environment. Shoot em up in the air as they fly to escape your perfect aim. Like skeet shooting but only ducks. If you also like deer hunting games and fishing games were sure you will love this beautiful duck hunting simulation duck game. No specific hunter age required to shoot these ducks, unless your under the download age... Have fun!
